reviews.review: even 10 years after, this game is wonderfull
great game, much more polished than the first. lots of sarcastic comments from gladys. overall very good game
great game even if its old

One of the best games ever made with great physics, easy to understand mechanics, loads of secrets and easter eggs and a really good and interesting story and lore. Just a lot of fun in single player and multiplayer with friends.
My favourite game ever, It has a lot of replay-ability and is very fun to play with friends. I do have one issue where the game caps at 30 fps but it's fine by me.
pls portal 3 for the love of god
Its very funny game singeplayer very good coop is epic trolling
When I started speedrunning this I was a loser, that's the same but at least I know how to beat this game fast

Ok i never do serious reviews but here we go. Holy shit, if you've never played the game, buy this shit RIGHT NOW. This is not a forgetfull experience at all. The charm the characters have is funny, and even sad. This game almost had me in tears at the end. I love this game and its easily the best game ive played period. This series has had such a large impact on the game industry as a whole. The voices are amazingly done, and i think this is the gold standard for video games. 10/10 i recommend this game
If you have never played this game before, you have missed out, this is my favorite puzzle game of all time

Glados est immortelle.

Imma do an honest review. This game is probably the best and only best sequel to anything in existence. The voice acting, the soundtrack, the story line, the complexity, and ease to understand ties this game together that no one else can do.
[spoiler] The tone in Wheatley's voice is so welcoming in the beginning of the game, but right when you are betrayed by him it feels so personal. Befriending Glados and defeating Wheatley is such an amazing feeling of revenge. [/spoiler] 
I will replay this game every 3-4 months just when I remember how amazing this game is.
Each time I replay this game I am always reminded of how beautiful the soundtrack is. Each time you look at the ruins of this place you are stuck in, the soundtrack follows your curiosity. 
In my first playthrough of this game, I was so confused at what to do in the game, it felt somewhat overwhelming. But right at the moment you realize the answer to a puzzle it feels so rewarding.
Even though this game is more than 10 years old, it is still unforgettable experience that stays with anyone who plays it.

10 out of 10 would play again.
this game taught me to never trust british people
loved the style and humour of this game, i played it as a kid and had to buy it as an adult. definitely  worth it for co-op as well.
